partintro.para: IAM Plugin is composed of sample codes to guide the basic usage of Anyframe IAM that provides the user authentication and authorization function based on Spring Security and reference libraries necessary to use these open sources.
Install IAM plugin by entering the following command in the Command window.
The installation result can be checked by using the installed (mvn anyframe:installed) or the jetty:run(mvn clean jetty:run) commands.

para.emphasis: Notes for each WAS(Web Application Server)

partintro.para: The following is notes for each WAS on sample applications with IAM Plugin.

listitem.para: 6.0 : For compatibility with the Spring Security library used by sample applications generated by installing Security Plugin, the newest JEUS 6.0 patch should be installed.
